name: Jetpack Hunter - Crazy Joy Flying Jet Ride
name_original: Jetpack Hunter - Crazy Joy Flying Jet Ride
description:
Fun and crazy times as Jetpack Hunter shoots down flying mice and strange colorful balls. Oh, and watch out for those stinging yellow jacket bees! It’s enough to make anyone crazy. This is crazy fun! Use your skills to help the Jetpack Hunter collect gold and silver coins to unlock new characters, even one in an airplane!

EXCITING FUN AND ITS FREE TO DOWNLOAD!!!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tap the lower left to raise the Jetpack Hunter
- Tap the lower right to shoot
- Avoid flying objects while shooting down flying mice, bees, and strange balls
- Collect gold and silver coins to unlock new characters

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Jetpack Hunter’ Now!!!
